title: The Great Gatsby
summary: The story revolves around Jay Gatsby, a wealthy man who throws extravagant parties in hopes of winning back his former lover Daisy Buchanan. The novel explores themes such as the American Dream, social class, and the corruption of wealth. The characters include Jay Gatsby, Nick Carraw, Tom Buchanan, Daisy Buchanan, Jordan Baker, and Myrtle Wilson.

character_list.name: Jay Gatsby
character_list.desc: A wealthy man who throws extravagant parties to win back his former lover, Daisy Buchanan.

character_list.name: Nick Carraw (Carraway)
character_list.desc: The narrator and friend of Jay Gatsby. He witnesses the various characters' actions and reactions during the story's events.

character_list.name: Tom Buchanan
character_list.desc: Daisy Buchanan's husband, he is a wealthy man with a gambling problem and an affair with Myrtle Wilson.

character_list.name: Daisy Buchanan
character_list.desc: Jay Gatsby's former lover. Her character undergoes development throughout the story as her relationships with Tom and Gatsby change.

character_list.name: Jordan Baker
character_list.desc: A friend of Daisy who also attends Gatsby's parties. She provides insight into the social dynamics of the characters.

character_list.name: Myrtle Wilson
character_list.desc: Tom Buchanan's mistress, her life is short and ends tragically due to an accident involving Tom's car.
